-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Redis backend for wai-middleware-cache
--   
--   This package provides Redis backend for wai-middleware-cache
@package wai-middleware-cache-redis
@version 0.4.3


-- | Redis backend for <a>Network.Wai.Middleware.Cache</a>.
--   
--   This backend uses <a>Database.Redis.Pile</a> for low-lewel operations.
--   Main drawback of this backend is the fact that whole response will be
--   consumed in memory.
--   
--   <pre>
--   cache
--       (redisBackend 
--           -- use defaults, DB 0 and "myprefix" 
--           R.defaultConnectInfo 0 
--           "myprefix"         -- prefix for caching
--           Nothing            -- no expiration
--           ["mytag"]          -- one cache tag
--           (rawPathInfo)      -- URL path as key 
--           lookupETag         -- And find "If-None-Match"
--       ) app -- our app
--   </pre>
module Network.Wai.Middleware.Cache.Redis

-- | Redis backend for <a>Network.Wai.Middleware.Cache</a>.
redisBackend :: ConnectInfo -> Integer -> ByteString -> Integer -> [ByteString] -> (Request -> ByteString) -> (Request -> Maybe ByteString) -> CacheBackend
